# wheelr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of wheelr is to help R users apply the principles explained in Donald J. Wheeler's book, *Understanding Variation: The Key to Managing Chaos"*.

## Installation

You can install the development version of wheelr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lddurbin/wheelr")
```
